titles.title: Stop Arming Iran Act
A bill to prohibit the sale by the Department of Defense of parts for F-14 fighter aircraft.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1190)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S12369)

bill.summary:
1/25/2007--Introduced.
Stop Arming Iran Act - Prohibits the Department of Defense (DOD) from selling any parts for the F-14 fighter aircraft (parts), whether through the Defense Reutilization and Marketing Service or through another DOD agency or element. Provides an exception with respect to the sale of such parts to a U.S. museum or similar organization involved in the preservation of F-14 fighter aircraft for historical purposes. Prohibits the issuance of any license for the export of such parts to a non-U.S. person or entity.
